metadata.title: CVE-2020-27171 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - high
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.11.8.kernel/bpf/verifier.c has an off-by-one error (with a resultant integerunderflow) affecting out-of-bounds speculation on pointer arithmetic,leading to side-channel attacks that defeat Spectre mitigations and obtainsensitive information from kernel memory, aka CID-10d2bb2e6b1d.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27171` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-azure - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-gcp - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-oracle - 6.8.0-1005.5
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-oracle-64k - 6.8.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1004-raspi - 6.8.0-1004.4

No subscription required
